CustomField.formula: IF( OR(AND(CoverageLineItemType__c ="Main Coverage",ISPICKVAL(Coverage__r.Coverage_Type__c, "Endorsement")), AND(CoverageLineItemType__c ="Sub Coverage",ISPICKVAL(Sub_Coverage__r.Coverage_Type__c, "Endorsement"))) ,"Endorsement Coverage", IF(AND( CONTAINS(CoverageLineItemType__c,"Option"), ISPICKVAL(Limits_Deductibles__r.Limit_Deductible_Type__c, "Endorsement")) , "Endorsement Option","Standard" ) )
CustomField.label: Type
